member.name: T:FluentUI.Blazor.Community.ByteSize
member.summary: Provides binary (IEC) unit constants, properties, and methods for the struct.
Represents a size in bytes and provides methods for formatting, conversion, and comparison.
Provides operator overloads and comparison logic for the struct.
Provides decimal (SI) unit constants, properties, and methods for the struct.

When this property is set to , the user cannot open the cookie dialog again after he accepted or declined the cookies. When this property is set to , the user can open the cookie dialog again only if he accepted or declined the cookies the first time.

member.name: M:FluentUI.Blazor.Community.Components.EmojiExtensions.EmojiRegexComplied
member.remarks:
Pattern:
(:[\\w+-]+:)
Options:
RegexOptions.Compiled
Explanation:
1st capture group.
Match ':'.
Match a character in the set [+-\w] atomically at least once.
Match ':'.

member.name: M:FluentUI.Blazor.Community.Components.EmojiExtensions.TagRegexCompiled
member.remarks:
Pattern:
<[^>]*>?
Options:
RegexOptions.Compiled | RegexOptions.RightToLeft
Explanation:
Match '>' greedily, optionally right-to-left.
Match a character other than '>' greedily any number of times right-to-left.
Match '<' right-to-left.
